title: Executive Order 6477-Withdrawal of Public Lands for Classification, South Dakota
content: By virtue of the authority vested in me by the act of June 25, 1910 (ch. 421, 36 Stat. 847), as amended by the act of August 24, 1912 (ch. 369, 37 Stat. 497), it is hereby ordered that the public lands in the following-described area in the State of South Dakota be, and the same are hereby, temporarily withdrawn for classification and pending determination as to the advisability of including such lands in a national monument, subject to the conditions of the aforesaid acts and to valid existing rights:
T. 2 S., R. 14 E., sec. 13, all;
This order shall continue in full force and effect unless and until revoked by the President or by an act of Congress.
citation: Franklin D. Roosevelt, Executive Order 6477-Withdrawal of Public Lands for Classification, South Dakota Online by Gerhard Peters and John T. Woolley, The American Presidency Project https://www.presidency.ucsb.edu/node/362299
